title: Tesla shares jump 10% after first robotaxi rides hit the road in Austin, Texas
description: The automaker deployed a small fleet of self-driving taxis in Austin, Texas, on Sunday, marking the first time its cars have carried paying passengers without human drivers. The rides were being offered for a flat fee of $4.20 in a limited zone.
